item.title: 华为 MatePad Edge 亮相
item.guid: 华为-MatePad-Edge-亮相
item.description:
On November 19, at the Huawei HarmonyOS office new product technology communication conference, the first HarmonyOS 2-in-1 tablet PC, "Huawei MatePad Edge," officially debuted. 11 月 19 日，在华为鸿蒙办公新品技术沟通会上，首款鸿蒙二合一平板电脑「华为 MatePad Edge」正式亮相。

Based on the underlying capabilities of the HarmonyOS operating system, the Huawei MatePad Edge achieves a perfect integration of the tablet and PC ecosystems. Users can not only enjoy a complete mobile entertainment and creation ecosystem for tablets but also seamlessly enter a PC-level professional office environment. 基于鸿蒙操作系统的底层能力，华为 MatePad Edge 实现了平板生态与电脑生态的完美融合。用户既能畅享完整的平板移动娱乐与创作生态，也能无缝进入 PC 级的专业办公环境。

In terms of form factor, the Huawei MatePad Edge integrates a free-switching design between tablet, PC, and stand modes. The new device will feature a large-area kickstand on the back, support an external floating keyboard (with trackpad), and will also support a stylus. 形态方面，华为 MatePad Edge 融合了平板、电脑与支架形态的自由切换设计。新机将拥有背部大面积支架，支持外接悬浮式键盘（带触控板），并且其将支持手写笔。

It is reported that the Huawei MatePad Edge is equipped with a 14.2-inch flexible OLED Yunxi Soft Light Screen with a 94% screen-to-body ratio, featuring six speakers with high and low-frequency division and mobile panoramic sound. Notably, the top configuration offers a 24GB/32GB+1TB combination. 据悉，华为 MatePad Edge 搭载 14.2 英寸 94% 屏占比的柔性 OLED 云晰柔光屏，配备高低音分频的六扬声器与移动全景声。值得一提的是，顶配提供 24GB/32GB+1TB 组合。

Furthermore, the Huawei MatePad Edge, equipped with an innovative heat dissipation architecture, can quickly dissipate heat through a micropump liquid cooling film and dual diamond aluminum fans, achieving an industry-leading 28W performance release in a slim 6.85mm 2-in-1 body. 此外，搭载创新散热架构的华为 MatePad Edge 能通过微泵液冷膜与金刚铝双风扇快速带走热量，在 6.85mm 轻薄机身中实现二合一业界领先的 28W 性能释放。

The Huawei MatePad Edge will be officially released on November 25. This launch event will also unveil the new flagship Huawei Mate80 series, Mate X7 dual-foldable, and FreeBuds Pro 5 Yuezhang headphones. 华为 MatePad Edge 将于 11 月 25 日正式发布。本次发布会还将发布全新旗舰华为 Mate80 系列、Mate X7 双折叠、FreeBuds Pro 5 悦彰耳机。

item.title: 罗福莉首秀，小米「人车家全生态」合作伙伴大会定档
item.guid: 罗福莉首秀，小米「人车家全生态」合作伙伴大会定档
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi officially announced that the 2025 Xiaomi Human-Car-Home All-Ecology Partner Conference will be officially held on December 17. 昨日，小米公司正式宣布，2025 小米人车家全生态合作伙伴大会将于 12 月 17 日正式举办。

According to official sources, this Xiaomi "Human-Car-Home Full Ecosystem" Partner Conference focuses on cutting-edge software and hardware technologies, explores new industry trends, covers Xiaomi HyperOS, internet services, IoT and ecosystem chain businesses, and for the first time includes automotive CarIoT ecosystem business. 据官方介绍，本次小米「人车家全生态」合作伙伴大会聚焦软硬件前沿技术、探索行业新趋势，涵盖小米澎湃 OS、互联网服务、IoT 与生态链业务，并首次纳入汽车 CarIoT 生态业务。

The official conference agenda shows that Xiaomi Group executives, including Xiaomi Group President Lu Weibing and Xiaomi Software Department Product General Manager Li Nan, will attend this event. 从官方公布的大会议程显示，小米集团总裁卢伟冰、小米软件部产品部总经理李楠等集团高管都将出席本次活动。

It is worth noting that Luo Fuli, the "AI genius girl" who recently officially announced her joining Xiaomi, will also attend this event and give a speech on Xiaomi's foundational large model as the head of Xiaomi's MiMo large model. 值得关注的是， 前不久刚正式宣布加入小米的「AI 天才少女」罗福莉也将出席本次活动 ，并且作为小米 MiMo 大模型负责人进行小米基座大模型演讲。

It is reported that Xiaomi's "MiMo" team has announced and open-sourced several models this year, including the multimodal large model "Xiaomi MiMo-VL", the inference large model "Xiaomi MiMo", and the native end-to-end speech large model "Xiaomi-MiMo-Audio". 据悉，小米的「MiMo」团队已在今年公布并开源多款模型，包含多模态大模型「Xiaomi MiMo-VL」、推理大模型「Xiaomi MiMo」、原生端到端语音大模型「Xiaomi-MiMo-Audio」。

Last week, Xiaomi officially released its future smart home exploration solution, Xiaomi Miloco (full name Xiaomi Local Copilot), being the first to introduce AI large model capabilities into whole-house smart scenarios. 而在上周，小米正式发布智能家居未来探索方案 Xiaomi Miloco（全称 Xiaomi Local Copilot），率先将 AI 大模型能力引入全屋智能场景。

According to the introduction, the core of Miloco lies in achieving intelligent interaction of "perception + understanding" through its self-developed Xiaomi MiMo-VL-Miloco-7B edge-side visual language large model. 据介绍，Miloco 的核心在于通过自研 Xiaomi MiMo-VL-Miloco-7B 端侧视觉语言大模型，实现「感知 + 理解」的智能交互。

Users do not need tedious rule settings; they only need to express their needs in natural language, and the system can complete complex scene linkages through inference calculations. For example, "When I'm reading, help me turn on the desk lamp and play music," Miloco can automatically recognize and execute. 用户无需繁琐的规则设定，只需以自然语言表达需求，系统即可通过推理计算完成复杂场景联动。例如「当我读书时，帮我打开台灯并播放音乐」，Miloco 能够自动识别并执行。

item.title: Meta AI 大牛官宣离职并创业
item.guid: Meta-AI-大牛官宣离职并创业
item.description:
Just now, Turing Award winner and Meta's Chief AI Scientist, Yann LeCun, posted on Threads, officially stating that he will be leaving Meta to start a new venture. 刚刚， 图灵奖得主、Meta 首席人工智能科学家 Yann LeCu（杨立昆）在 Threads 发文，正式表示自己将离开 Meta 并进行创业。

In his resignation statement, Yann LeCun stated that he is founding a startup company and will continue to advance the "Advanced Machine Intelligence" (AMI) project that he has been working on for the past few years at FAIR, NYU, and other places. 杨立昆在离职声明中表示， 自己正在创立一家初创公司 ，并继续推进过去几年在 FAIR、纽约大学及其他地方开展的「高级机器智能」(AMI) 项目。

According to him, the company's goal is directly aimed at the next AI revolution – creating systems that can understand the physical world, possess persistent memory, perform reasoning, and plan complex sequences of actions. 据其介绍，这家公司的目标直指下一次 AI 变革——创造能够理解物理世界、具备持久记忆、能进行推理并规划复杂行动序列的系统。

It is worth mentioning that Meta will become a partner of the new company , and the latter specifically thanked Zuckerberg, Andrew Bosworth, Chris Cox, and Mike Schroepfer for their support of the FAIR and AMI projects. 值得一提的是， Meta 将会成为新公司的合作伙伴 ，因此后者也特别感谢了扎克伯格、Andrew Bosworth、Chris Cox 和 Mike Schroepfer 对 FAIR 及 AMI 项目的支持。

Yann LeCun emphasized that the choice of an independent entity was to maximize its broad impact. He himself will work at Meta until the end of this year, and more details about the new company will be announced at an appropriate time. 杨立昆强调，之所以选择独立实体的形式， 是为了最大化其广泛影响力。 而他本人将在 Meta 工作到今年年底，关于新公司的更多细节，会在合适时机公布。

It is reported that Yann LeCun joined Facebook (Meta's predecessor) in 2013 and served as the founding director of Fundamental AI Research (FAIR). 据悉，杨立昆于 2013 年加入 Facebook（Meta 前身），并出任基础人工智能研究（FAIR）的创始主任。

However, in June this year, Meta made a significant investment in the data labeling company Scale AI, and Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg appointed Scale AI's CEO, Alexandr Wang, as the new leader of Meta's Super Intelligence Lab, which also led to a change in Yann LeCun's reporting structure. 而在今年 6 月，Meta 却大手笔的投资了数据标注公司 Scale AI，并且 Meta CEO 扎克伯格将后者的 CEO Alexandr Wang 任命为 Meta 超级智能实验室的新领导人，也因此导致杨立昆的工作汇报结构发生变化。

Furthermore, there were also disagreements between Zuckerberg and Yann LeCun regarding AI strategy. 另外，扎克伯格与杨立昆还存在着 AI 战略的分歧。

According to previous reports from Forbes, several former Meta employees stated that the FAIR department had been "slowly dying" because the company prioritized business-oriented AI teams over long-term research. 据《福布斯》此前消息，Meta 多名前员工曾表示，由于公司优先考虑以商业为导向的 AI 团队而非长期研究，FAIR 部门一直在「缓慢地走向消亡」。

item.title: 英伟达创 570 亿美元营收记录
item.guid: 英伟达创-570-亿美元营收记录
item.description:
Early this morning, Nvidia announced its financial results for the third quarter of fiscal year 2026 (ending October 26, 2025): 今天凌晨，英伟达公布了其 2026 财年第三季度（截至 2025 年 10 月 26 日）财务情况：

Revenue for the quarter hit a record of $57 billion (approximately 405.3 billion RMB), a 22% increase quarter-over-quarter and a 62% increase year-over-year.

Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang stated that sales of its Blackwell (AI chips) are soaring, and cloud GPUs are sold out. It is reported that Nvidia's data center business saw a surge of $10 billion in revenue this quarter, reaching $51.2 billion (approximately 364.1 billion RMB), a year-over-year increase of up to 66%. 英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋表示，旗下 Blackwell（AI 芯片）销量节节攀升，而云 GPU 已售罄。据悉，英伟达的数据中心业务在该季度猛增 100 亿美元营收，达到 512 亿美元（约合人民币 3641 亿元），同比增长高达 66%。

According to analysis by The Verge, many eyes are currently focused on Nvidia's data center revenue, viewing it as a barometer for the entire "AI bubble." 据媒体 The Verge 分析，现阶段许多目光都聚焦于英伟达的数据中心营收，将其视为衡量整个「AI 泡沫」的晴雨表。

Despite concerns about a bubble burst, Nvidia does not seem to expect its data center business growth to slow down: its fourth-quarter outlook is as high as $65 billion. This means the company needs to grow another $8 billion in quarterly revenue within the next three months. 尽管存在泡沫破裂的担忧，但英伟达似乎并不预期其数据中心业务增长会放缓： 其第四季度展望高达 650 亿美元。 这意味着在未来三个月内，该公司需要再增长 80 亿美元季度营收。

During the subsequent investor call, when asked about concerns regarding an 'AI bubble,' Jensen Huang appeared confident, stating, 'There's a lot of talk about an AI bubble, but from our perspective, the situation is completely different (compared to the dot-com bubble era). AI is transforming existing workloads, and we don't see an AI bubble.' 在随后的投资者电话会中，当被问及「AI 泡沫」的担忧时，黄仁勋显得信心满满，其表示， 「关于 AI 泡沫的说法有很多，但从我们的角度来看，情况（与互联网泡沫时期相比）截然不同。AI 正在改变现有的工作负载，并没有看到 AI 泡沫的存在。」

Jensen Huang reiterated many of the same claims Nvidia has been making for years about AI changing everything, adding that AI has 'reached a tipping point,' and stating that 'the transition to autonomous and physical AI will be revolutionary.' 黄仁勋回顾了英伟达多年来一直提出的关于 AI 将改变一切的许多相同主张，并补充说 AI 已经「达到了一个临界点」，其表示「向自主和物理 AI 的过渡将是革命性的。」

According to Reuters, citing data firm Counterpoint, Nvidia recently decided to switch the memory chips for AI servers from DDR5, used in traditional servers, to low-power LPDDR, typically used in mobile phones and tablets, to reduce server energy consumption costs. 据路透社援引数据机构 Counterpoint 消息， 英伟达近期还决定将 AI 服务器的内存芯片从传统服务器使用的 DDR5 转向通常用于手机和平板电脑的低功耗 LPDDR，以降低服务器能耗成本。

The report points out that this plan could make Nvidia an LPDDR customer on par with major smartphone manufacturers, and the supply chain would struggle to easily absorb demand of this magnitude. 报道指出，这一计划可能会令英伟达成为与主要智能手机制造商同等规模的 LPDDR 客户，而供应链难以轻易消化如此规模的需求。

It is understood that over the past two months, the global electronics supply chain has been under pressure due to a shortage of traditional memory chips, as manufacturers shifted their focus to high-end memory chips suitable for AI applications. 据悉，过去两个月，全球电子供应链已因传统内存芯片短缺而承压，原因是制造商将重心转向适用于 AI 应用的高端内存芯片。

Nvidia's shift could lead to supply tightness in the low-end market being transmitted upwards, forcing chip manufacturers to weigh whether to shift more capacity to LPDDR production. 而英伟达的这一转向可能导致低端市场的供应紧张向上传导，迫使芯片制造商权衡是否将更多产能转向 LPDDR 生产。

The report analyzes that rising server memory prices will increase costs for cloud service providers and AI developers, further adding to data center budget pressure. These companies are already facing financial strain due to record spending on graphics processors and power upgrades. 报道分析，服务器内存价格上涨将提高云服务提供商和 AI 开发商的成本，进一步加大数据中心预算压力。目前这些企业已因图形处理器和电力升级的创纪录支出而面临财务紧张。

item.title: 工信部：今年我国 AI 玩具市场规模预计达 290 亿元
item.guid: 工信部：今年我国-AI-玩具市场规模预计达-290-亿元
item.description:
According to Xinhua Finance, on November 19, the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology held a press conference to introduce the revision of the GB 6675 'Toy Safety' series of mandatory national standards. 据新华财经报道，11 月 19 日，工业和信息化部举行新闻发布会，介绍 GB 6675《玩具安全》系列强制性国家标准修订情况。

He Yaqiong, Director of the Consumer Products Industry Department of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, stated at the conference that AI toys are deeply loved by young people and have become a new competitive track in the industry. According to statistics, China's AI toy market size in 2024 is approximately 24.6 billion yuan, and is expected to increase to 29 billion yuan for the full year of 2025. 工业和信息化部消费品工业司司长何亚琼在会上表示，AI 玩具深受年轻人喜爱，已成为行业竞争的新赛道。据统计， 2024 年我国 AI 玩具市场规模约 246 亿元，预计 2025 年全年将增至 290 亿元。

He Yaqiong pointed out that currently, driven by both technological revolution and consumption upgrade, China's toy industry is entering a new stage of intelligent development. In particular, the deep integration of artificial intelligence technology with the traditional toy industry is accelerating the reshaping of product forms and value chain structures, with AI toys becoming a new engine for promoting high-quality industrial development. 何亚琼指出，当前，在技术革命和消费升级的双重驱动下，我国玩具产业正迈向智能化发展的全新阶段。尤其是人工智能技术与传统玩具产业深度融合，加速重塑产品形态与价值链结构，AI 玩具正成为推动产业高质量发展的新引擎。

The development of the AI toy industry exhibits several significant characteristics: AI 玩具产业发展呈现多方面显著特征：

    Stronger product integration: Toys have evolved into an important carrier for integrated application and innovative integration of AI technology. Large language models, visual models, etc., enable toy products to 'understand,' 'see,' and 'think.' They can brainstorm and interact with you. At the same time, AI technology integrates with national trend cultural IPs, making toy products full of technological and cultural appeal, significantly enhancing product added value.

    Redefined functional roles: With the integration of AI technology into toy products, the role of toys in people's lives has evolved from a single entertainment function to a 'smart partner' that integrates attributes such as educational enlightenment, emotional companionship, and creativity stimulation, moving from 'unchanging' to 'understanding you more and more.'

Additionally, there is full coverage of user groups. AI toys break the age restrictions of traditional toy products, achieving full coverage for 'elderly, middle-aged, young, and children,' greatly satisfying the diverse consumption needs of all age groups. 另外还有用户群体全覆盖。 AI 玩具打破了传统玩具产品的年龄限制，实现了「老、中、青、幼」全覆盖，极大满足了各年龄层群体的多样化消费需求。

For example, an AI memory assistant toy can remind seniors to take medication on time and schedule medical appointments via voice, as well as play old songs and tell historical stories to help alleviate memory decline, making it widely popular among the elderly. Many AI toys can connect to Wi-Fi or Bluetooth to access the internet, download the latest content, and more. 如一款 AI 记忆助手玩具，既能通过语音提醒老年人按时用药、预约就医，还能播放老歌、讲述历史故事，帮助缓解记忆衰退，广受老年人欢迎。许多 AI 玩具可以连接 Wi-Fi 或蓝牙，实现上网、下载最新内容等功能。

He Yaqiong stated that in the next step, the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology will strengthen work coordination with relevant departments to jointly promote the high-quality development of the AI toy industry. 何亚琼表示，下一步，工业和信息化部将加强与相关部门的工作协同，共同推动 AI 玩具产业高质量发展。

item.title: 蔚来智驾芯片被曝首次技术外供
item.guid: 蔚来智驾芯片被曝首次技术外供
item.description:
According to LatePost Auto, Nio's self-developed high-level intelligent driving chip 'Shenji NX9031' has begun external technology supply, providing technical authorization to an automotive chip company. 据《晚点 Auto》报道， 蔚来自研高阶智能驾驶芯片「神玑 NX9031」开始技术外供，向一家汽车芯片公司提供技术授权。

The report points out that the Shenji NX9031 involved in Nio's external technology supply uses a 5nm automotive-grade process, with actual computing power approximately four times that of Nvidia Orin-X. This chip is currently installed in models such as the ET9, 2025 ES6, and EC6, and William Li stated that it can bring a cost optimization of 'approximately 10,000 yuan per vehicle.' 报道指出，此次蔚来技术外供涉及的神玑 NX9031，采用 5nm 车规工艺，实际算力约为英伟达 Orin-X 的四倍。目前该芯片已搭载在 ET9、2025 款 ES6、EC6 等车型上，李斌称可带来 「单车约 1 万元」 的成本优化。

The chip project was initiated in 2021, with a team size exceeding 600 people, covering front-end design, back-end design, verification, and testing, already approaching the scale of an independent chip company, with an investment scale exceeding that of Xpeng and Li Auto's projects during the same period. 该芯片项目于 2021 年立项，项目团队规模超过 600 人，覆盖前端设计、后端设计、验证与测试，已经接近一个独立芯片公司的规模，投入规模超过同期小鹏、理想的项目。

Li Bin once revealed that the R&D expenditure for NX9031 was equivalent to the cost of building 1,000 battery swap stations. Based on an estimate of 1.5 million to 3 million yuan per station, the total R&D investment is in the billions of yuan. 李斌曾透露，NX9031 的研发支出等于建设 1000 座换电站的成本。按每座 150 万至 300 万元测算，总研发投入在几十亿元级别。

In March this year, William Li, CEO of Nio, publicly stated at the China EV100 Forum that Nio's chips and operating systems would be open to the industry, saying, "If you want to buy the best chips, you can come to Nio." In June, Nio established Anhui Shenji Technology Co., responsible for integrating chip R&D, mass production, licensing, and other businesses, while maintaining absolute control. 而在今年 3 月，蔚来 CEO 李斌在中国电动汽车百人论坛上公开表示，蔚来的芯片和操作系统会对行业开放，「如果大家想买最好的芯片可以找蔚来」。6 月，蔚来成立安徽神玑技术公司，负责整合芯片研发、量产、授权等业务，并保持绝对控制权。

Industry insiders reported that different licensing methods correspond to different contract values. If it's a single IP license, the cooperation fee is usually in the millions of dollars; if it's a system-level SoC technology license, the order value could reach hundreds of millions of yuan. 芯片行业人士通过报道表示，不同的授权方式对应着不同的合约价值。如果是单一的 IP 授权，合作费用通常为数百万美元级别；如果是系统级 SoC 的技术授权，那订单价值可能达亿元级别。

item.title: 伦敦窃贼也「挑食」：只偷 iPhone，三星被当场归还
item.guid: 伦敦窃贼也「挑食」：只偷-iPhone，三星被当场归还
item.description:
According to "London Centric," a strange phone theft trend has recently emerged in London: thieves specifically target iPhone users, while showing disdain for Android users, even returning their phones on the spot. 据《London Centric》报道，伦敦近期出现了一种奇怪的手机盗窃行为： 窃贼们专门针对 iPhone 用户下手，面对 Android 用户则是不屑一顾，甚至当场将手机归还。

Interviewee Sam stated that he was previously surrounded and robbed by 8 men, and items such as his camera and knitted hat were all stolen. However, after the thieves took his phone and other items, they returned the phone, saying they "didn't want Samsung." 受访者 Sam 称自己此前遭受到 8 名男子围堵并抢劫，其身上相机、针织帽等物品都被洗劫一空。但窃贼在抢走手机在内的物品后，却将手机归还了回来，并表示「不想要三星」。

The report points out that Sam was not the only one to experience such an encounter; many London citizens with Android phones have also shared their "post-robbery experiences." 报道指出，上述同样的遭遇并非 Sam 一个人遇到，有不少用 Android 手机的伦敦市民也都分享了自己的「劫后历程」。

It is reported that phone theft crime is called "Apple picking," where thieves openly show a strong preference for iPhones, while phones from other mainstream brands, especially Android devices, are often "disdained" by them. 据悉，手机盗窃犯罪被称为「Apple picking」（专偷苹果），窃贼们公然表现出对 iPhone 的强烈偏好，而其他主流品牌的手机，尤其是安卓设备，则常常被他们「嫌弃」。

The report states that for thieves, stealing an iPhone that can be resold for a higher price offers a "return on investment" far exceeding other brands. 报道称，对窃贼而言， 偷一部转手能卖出更高价格的 iPhone，其「投资回报率」远超其他品牌。

Therefore, although the London police do not classify theft cases by phone brand, security experts and local residents have noticed that thieves are increasingly targeting iPhone users as their primary objective. 因此，尽管伦敦警方并未按手机品牌对盗窃案进行分类统计，但安保专家和当地居民都已注意到，窃贼们正越来越倾向于将 iPhone 用户作为首要目标。

item.title: 消息称广汽丰田部分主销油车将停产
item.guid: 消息称广汽丰田部分主销油车将停产
item.description:
According to Auto Pixel, marked by the discontinuation of several fuel vehicles with monthly sales exceeding 10,000 units, Toyota China is readjusting the relationship between its northern and southern joint ventures to pave the way for new energy transformation. 据汽车像素消息，以停产数款月销过万的燃油车为标志，丰田中国正重新调整南北合资公司之间的关系，为新能源转型铺路。

The report states that to align with Toyota China's strategic goals, the two joint ventures, North and South Toyota, will streamline their fuel vehicle product lines at their own pace: 报道称，为配合丰田中国的战略目标，南北丰田两合资公司将按照自身的节奏，精简自己的燃油车产品线：

    GAC Toyota: At least two main fuel vehicles will be discontinued by 2026, one being a compact sedan with recent monthly sales of over a thousand units, and the other a mid-size SUV with monthly sales exceeding ten thousand units.

    FAW Toyota: Similarly, some models will be discontinued, including a flagship sedan with monthly sales of over ten thousand units.

The report points out that GAC Toyota's third production line will begin renovation in the first half of next year, and after completion, it will produce new energy vehicles. Correspondingly, in the first half of next year, GAC Toyota will only discontinue a low-volume sedan, while another higher-volume SUV is expected to be gradually phased out by the end of next year. 报道指出，广汽丰田第三生产线会在明年上半年启动改造，完成后生产新年能源车。与之对应的，明年上半年广汽丰田只会停产一款销量较小的轿车，另一款销量较高的 SUV，预计明年底才会逐渐停产。

A GAC Toyota dealer revealed through the report that GAC Toyota slightly lowered its sales target for fuel vehicles in November at the end of last month, while significantly raising the monthly sales target for Bozhi 3X. 有广汽丰田的经销商通过报道透露，广汽丰田在上月底小幅下调了 11 月燃油车的销量目标，大幅调高了铂智 3X 的月销量目标。

The report states that North and South Toyota cannot undertake the development of self-developed new cars, so new car R&D will be led by Toyota China and completed in cooperation with domestic automobile companies. Judging from the trends of Bozhi 3X, GAC Toyota's products are jointly developed by Toyota China and GAC Group, while FAW Toyota's products cooperate with BYD. 报道称，南北丰田无法承担自研新车的开发，因此新车的研发会由丰田中国主导，与国内汽车公司合作完成。从铂智 3X、的动向来看，广汽丰田的产品由丰田中国和广汽集团联合研发，一汽丰田的产品与比亚迪合作。

item.title: 2025 SparkS 全球 AI 硬件创新大赛启动
item.guid: 2025-SparkS-全球-AI-硬件创新大赛启动
item.description:
On November 18, the "2025 SparkS Global AI Hardware Innovation Competition" officially launched. 11 月 18 日，「2025 SparkS 全球 AI 硬件创新大赛」正式启动。

The competition is a high-level event jointly created by the local government, Hangzhou Talent Group, Hangzhou Innovation (AI) Camp, Tuya Smart, and others. Relying on Hangzhou's AI industry hub, the innovation and entrepreneurship resources aggregated by the Hangzhou Innovation (AI) Camp platform, and Tuya's global developer ecosystem, it aims to recruit AI hardware projects with commercial potential globally, focusing on the two key aspects of "AI hardware" and "application scenarios" to bridge the "last mile" from technological innovation to industrial implementation. 大赛是由属地政府和杭州市人才集团、杭创（人工智能）营、涂鸦智能等联合打造的高能级赛事，依托杭州市 AI 产业高地、杭创（人工智能）营平台聚合的创新创业资源及涂鸦全球化开发者生态，面向全球招募具备商业化潜力的 AI 硬件项目，聚焦「AI 硬件」与「应用场景」两大关键环节 ，打通从技术创新到产业落地的「最后一公里」。

As an international competition focusing on "AI+Hardware" and "Application Scenarios," the 2025 SparkS Global AI Hardware Innovation Competition is not limited to technical contests. Instead, it aims to connect global AI elites, industry resources, and investment institutions, creating a world-class AI innovation ecosystem that integrates technological innovation, industrial implementation, and capital matching. 作为聚焦「AI+硬件」与「应用场景」的国际级赛事，2025 SparkS 全球 AI 硬件创新大赛并不局限于技术竞赛，而是致力于连接全球 AI 精英、产业资源与投资机构，打造一个集技术创新、产业落地、资本对接为一体的世界级 AI 创新生态。

This competition features five major innovation tracks: AI+Life, AI+Business, AI+Industry, AI+Transportation, and AI+Social Governance, comprehensively covering the cutting-edge applications of AI technology in various fields. These tracks not only echo national AI development strategies but also directly address the deep-seated needs of industrial digital transformation and empowering developer innovation. 本届大赛共设置了五大创新赛道：AI+ 生活、AI+ 商业、AI+ 工业、AI+ 交通、AI+ 社会治理，全面覆盖 AI 技术在各领域的前沿应用。这些赛道不仅呼应国家 AI 发展战略，更直面产业数字化转型、赋能开发者创新的深层需求。

Whether from top hardware startup teams or research groups in universities with original technology; whether deeply cultivating consumer-grade smart products or focusing on vertical scenarios such as industry and transportation—as long as the idea has technological breakthrough potential and commercialization potential, developers will have the opportunity to stand out. 无论是来自顶尖硬件创业团队，还是高校中拥有原创技术的科研小组；无论是深耕消费级智能产品，还是专注工业、交通等垂直场景——只要创意具备技术突破性与商业化潜力，开发者们都有机会脱颖而出。

It is reported that the competition will ultimately select 30 of the most groundbreaking AI hardware innovation projects to enter the offline finals, and 10 "Excellent Application Awards" will be selected from them. 据悉， 大赛最终将遴选出 30 个最具突破性的 AI 硬件创新项目进入线下总决赛，并从中评选出「优秀应用奖」10 项。

At that time, all teams that successfully qualify and win awards will receive resource support from the government, organizers, and partner institutions, covering multiple dimensions such as capital matching, technology empowerment, policy support, and scenario implementation, jointly helping excellent projects move from concept to commercialization. 届时，所有成功入围并获奖的团队，均可获得来自政府、主办方与合作机构的资源支持，涵盖资本对接、技术赋能、政策扶持与场景落地等多重维度，共同助力优秀项目从创意走向商业化落地。

item.title: 英特尔举行 2025 技术创新与产业生态大会
item.guid: 英特尔举行-2025-技术创新与产业生态大会
item.description:
On November 19, the 2025 Intel Technology Innovation and Industry Ecosystem Conference opened today in Chongqing. 11 月 19 日，2025 英特尔技术创新与产业生态大会今天在重庆开幕。

Pat Gelsinger, CEO of Intel Corporation, stated in his video address: 英特尔公司首席执行官陈立武在视频致辞中表示：

In the wave of AI, we will continue to strengthen our cooperation with all partners, from clients and data centers to edge computing, to jointly seize new opportunities. To achieve this goal, we are fully committed to building a stronger, more focused, and more effective Intel. My mission is clear: to ensure that Intel's products can solve your most critical challenges and help you gain an early advantage in the market.

At the conference, customers such as Lenovo, HP, Tencent Games, ASUS, CVTE, China Mobile Migu, Volcengine, ZTE, Xfusion, Huaqin, and Luxshare shared their innovative achievements based on Intel's technology products, showcasing a vibrant and thriving ecosystem from clients and edge to cloud and data centers. 在大会现场，联想、惠普、腾讯游戏、华硕、视源、中国移动咪咕、火山引擎、中兴、超聚变、华勤、立讯等客户分享了基于英特尔技术产品的创新成果，展示了从客户端和边缘、到云和数据中心极具活力、蓬勃发展的生态系统。

It is reported that Intel is working with partners to explore new forms of AI PCs, creating AI-native PCs that deeply integrate models and data, and developing AI PC agent applications; at the edge, vertical customers are massively deploying generative AI based on Intel platforms, covering a wide range of fields such as embodied AI, smart education, and smart retail, opening up a new future for edge computing. 据悉，英特尔正与合作伙伴携手探索 AI PC 的新形态，打造深度融合模型及数据的 AI 原生 PC，开发 AI PC 智能体应用；在边缘，垂直客户正基于英特尔平台大规模部署生成式 AI，覆盖具身智能、智慧教育、智慧零售等广泛领域，开拓端侧计算新未来。

At this event, Intel also teamed up with local ecosystem partners—H3C, Invic, Yilian, and leading domestic memory manufacturers—to release a dual-socket cold plate full-domain liquid-cooled server based on Intel® Xeon® 6900 series performance core processors. 本次活动上，英特尔还携手本地生态伙伴——新华三、英维克、忆联及国内领先内存厂商，发布了基于英特尔® 至强® 6900 系列性能核处理器的双路冷板式全域液冷服务器。

This innovative solution, empowered by the full local ecosystem, achieves a high proportion of liquid cooling coverage for critical heat sources, significantly reducing energy consumption and operation and maintenance costs while improving reliability and energy efficiency, setting a new benchmark for data center cooling and energy efficiency. 该创新方案由全本地生态赋能，实现了关键热源的高比例液冷覆盖，在提升可靠性与能效的同时，显著降低能耗与运维成本，为数据中心散热与能效树立全新标杆。

item.title: 💡 Linux 之父：只要不是重要场合，氛围编程没问题
item.guid: 💡-Linux-之父：只要不是重要场合，氛围编程没问题
item.description:
Recently, Linus Torvalds, the creator of Linux, stated in an interview that he is generally "optimistic" about Vibe Coding, but he also pointed out that Vibe Coding is not suitable for formal production environments. 日前，Linux 之父 Linus Torvalds 在接受采访时表示，自己对氛围编程（Vibe Coding）总体上「很看好」，但他也同时指出氛围编程并不适合正式的生产环境。

Torvalds stated that Vibe Coding is only suitable for beginners, and it is not suitable for formal production environments, as it is very likely to lead to a messy maintenance later on. Torvalds 表示，氛围编程只适合新手入门，而面对正式的生产环境，它并不适合，很有可能会导致后期维护一团糟。

At the same time, Torvalds also stated that Vibe Coding is an excellent way for users to "make computers do things they might not be able to do." "Although Vibe Coding is terrible from a maintenance perspective." 同时 Torvalds 也表示，氛围编程是让用户能够达到「让计算机做一些他们可能无法做到的事情」的绝佳方式。「尽管氛围编程从维护的角度来看，很糟糕。」

Torvalds admitted that he has not used or tried AI-assisted programming, but he believes that some people will use AI for the kernel codebase. Torvalds 坦言，自己没使用也没尝试 AI 辅助编程，不过相信有人会把 AI 用于内核代码库。

When asked about the future career prospects of software development, Torvalds considered it a "complex question" that would take a few years to truly understand. "AI is just a tool, just as compilers once freed people from writing assembly by hand, improving efficiency, but did not make the programmer profession disappear." 而被问及软件开发未来的职业前景将如何发展时，Torvalds 认为这是个「复杂的问题」，需要几年后才能真正看清。「AI 只是工具，就像编译器曾让人们摆脱手写汇编，提高效率，但并没有让程序员职业消失。」

item.title: 高通官宣骁龙 8 Gen 5 处理器
item.guid: 高通官宣骁龙-8-Gen-5-处理器
item.description:
On November 19, Qualcomm announced that it will officially release a new member of the Snapdragon 8 series flagship mobile platform, the "fifth-generation Snapdragon 8" (Snapdragon 8 Gen 5), on November 26. 11 月 19 日，高通宣布，将在 11 月 26 日正式发布全新骁龙 8 系旗舰移动平台新成员「第五代骁龙 8」（骁龙 8 Gen 5）。

According to previous revelations by blogger "Digital Chat Station," the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 will adopt a 2+6 full-large-core architecture, with a GeekBench single-core score of 3055 and a multi-core score of 10460. Its single-core performance is basically catching up with the Snapdragon 8 Elite; the GPU is identified as the Adreno 840, which has the same architecture as the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5. 据此前博主「数码闲聊站」透露，骁龙 8 Gen 5 将采用 2+6 全大核架构，GeekBench 单核跑分 3055，多核跑分 10460，单核性能基本追上骁龙 8 Elite；GPU 识别为骁龙 8 Elite Gen 5 同款架构的 Adreno 840。

It is reported that the OnePlus Ace6T will be equipped with Snapdragon 8 Gen 5, featuring a large 8-series battery and 100W flash charging. In addition, the vivo S50 series will also offer the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 processor. 据悉，一加 Ace6T 将搭载骁龙 8 Gen 5，配备 8 字头大电池以及 100W 闪充。另外，vivo S50 系列也将提供骁龙 8 Gen 5 处理器。

item.title: 拍我 AI V5 Fast + Modify上线
item.guid: 拍我-AI-V5-Fast-+-Modify上线
item.description:
Yesterday, Aisi Technology announced that its globally leading AI video generation platform, Paiwo AI (overseas version PixVerse), officially launched V5 Fast mode and Modify refinement features. 昨日，爱诗科技宣布，旗下全球领先的 AI 视频生成平台拍我 AI（海外版 PixVerse）正式上线 V5 Fast 模式 与 Modify 精修功能。

The official statement indicates that the new version achieves a video generation speed increase of over 30% and for the first time supports true end-to-end intelligent editing, bringing creators a "faster, more controllable" AI video experience. 官方表示，新版本实现视频生成速度提升 30% 以上，并首次支持真正意义上的端到端智能编辑，为创作者带来「更快、更可控」的 AI 视频体验。

Specifically, V5 Fast further optimizes video generation speed, reducing the generation time for a 5-second 1080P video to less than 1 minute; social short videos can be completed in a few seconds, while maintaining consistency in action details, texture, and style. 具体来看，V5 Fast 进一步优化了视频生成速度，使 5 秒 1080P 视频的生成时长缩短至 1 分钟以内；社交短视频可在数秒内完成，同时保持动作细节、质感和风格的一致性。

The Modify refinement feature launched by Paiwo AI this time is the industry's first editing method based on "full video inference and tracking" of keyframe editing effects. 而拍我 AI 本次推出的 Modify 精修功能是行业首个基于关键帧编辑效果进行「全视频推理与追踪」的编辑方式。

Modify embeds image editing capabilities, allowing users to modify just one frame, and the system automatically synchronizes the effect to the entire video, achieving cross-frame consistency and natural visual transitions. This capability is currently only offered by Paiwo AI, significantly enhancing the precision and efficiency of video editing. Modify 内嵌图像编辑能力，用户只需对一帧进行修改，系统即可自动将效果同步到整段视频，实现跨帧一致、自然衔接的视觉表现。这一能力目前仅由拍我 AI 提供，使视频编辑的精准度和效率大幅提升。

item.title: 全球最小的可穿戴设备，Lumia 2 智能耳环上架
item.guid: 全球最小的可穿戴设备，Lumia-2-智能耳环上架
item.description:
Recently, Lumia officially unveiled its second-generation smart wearable device, the Lumia 2 smart earring, claiming it to be "the world's smallest wearable device". 日前，Lumia 正式公布了其二代智能穿戴设备 Lumia 2 智能耳环，并号称「世界上最小的可穿戴设备」。

Another highlight of Lumia 2 is its modular design, supporting multiple earring/stud designs, while the back sensor part integrates Lumia's second-generation PreciseLight sensor, processor, battery, and various health sensors. Lumia 2 另一亮点在于其的模块化设计，支持多个耳环/耳钉设计，而背部传感器部分整合了 Lumia 二代 PreciseLight 传感器、处理器、电池及多种健康传感器。

According to reports, Lumia 2 supports functions such as sleep/menstrual tracking, body temperature changes, head blood flow detection, and physical fitness monitoring; in terms of battery life, Lumia 2 supports up to 8 days of continuous use. 据介绍，Lumia 2 支持睡眠/经期追踪、体温变化、头部血液流量检测、体能检测等功能；续航方面，Lumia 2 支持最长 8 天续航。

Lumia 2 is priced at $249 (approximately RMB 1770) and supports a subscription model starting from $9.9/month. Lumia 2 定价为 249 美元（约合人民币 1770 元），支持 9.9 美元/月起的订阅制。

item.title: 星海 S7 800V 超充版正式上市
item.guid: 星海-S7-800V-超充版正式上市
item.description:
Last night, the Dongfeng Fengxing Xinghai S7 800V ultra-fast charging version was officially launched, with a limited-time trade-in price of 105,900 to 135,900 yuan (MSRP 119,900 to 149,900 yuan). 昨晚，东风风行星海 S7 800V 超快充版正式上市，限时置换价 10.59 万至 13.59 万元（指导价 11.99 万元至 14.99 万元）。

The Xinghai S7 800V ultra-fast charging version continues the "flowing clouds and water" oriental aesthetic design, creating a sleek body with a drag coefficient as low as 0.191Cd, and has won three global design awards, earning it the title of "supermodel coupe". 星海 S7 800V 超快充版延续「行云流水」的东方美学设计，塑造出风阻系数低至 0.191Cd 的流畅车身，并斩获三项全球设计大奖，被誉为「超模轿跑」。

The new car is equipped with a class-leading full-domain 800V high-voltage silicon carbide platform, achieving 800V architecture coverage across the entire chain from battery, electric drive, and electronic control to charging equipment. Official data shows that in terms of energy replenishment, the new car can add 320km of range with just 14 minutes of charging. 新车搭载同级领先的全域 800V 高压碳化硅平台，实现从电池、电驱、电控到充电设备全链路 800V 架构覆盖。官方数据显示，在补能表现上，新车充电 14 分钟即可增加 320km 续航。

In terms of performance, it boasts an ultra-low power consumption of 11.6 kWh per 100 kilometers and a 0-100 km/h acceleration in 5.9 seconds. For the driving experience, the ultra-long wheelbase of 2915mm creates a spacious interior, offering the Lamborghini-derived FSD Xiaoyao suspension. 性能方面，百公里 11.6kWh 的超低电耗与 5.9 秒的百公里加速。驾乘体验上，2915mm 的超长轴距营造了宽绰的内部空间，提供兰博基尼同源的 FSD 逍遥悬架。

Additionally, at the event, the Xinghai V9 user personalized customization plan was officially launched, introducing two co-created models: a camping vehicle and a welfare vehicle. This marks the brand's service upgrade from "single product delivery" to "providing scenario-based solutions," establishing the industry's first "user-led + technology empowerment + ecological synergy" MPV co-creation system. 另外，活动现场上，星海 V9 用户个性化定制计划正式启动，并率先推出了露营车与福祉车两款共创车型，标志着品牌正从 「单一产品交付」 向「提供场景化解决方案」进行服务升级，构建起行业首个「用户主导+技术赋能+生态协同」的 MPV 共创体系。

item.title: 胖东来年薪 50 万招聘国内仅 8 所高校符合
item.guid: 胖东来年薪-50-万招聘国内仅-8-所高校符合
item.description:
According to Jimu News, as of 24:00 on November 18, the resume submission channel for Pang Dong Lai Commercial Group's "English-Chinese Translation Assistant with an annual salary of 500,000 yuan" position has been closed. This position had previously sparked heated discussion due to its high salary, long vacation benefits, and high academic requirements. 据极目新闻报道，截至 11 月 18 日 24 时，胖东来商贸集团「年薪 50 万元招聘中英翻译助理」岗位简历投递通道已关闭。而该职位此前因高薪资长假期待遇，以及高学历要求，引发热议。

According to the job requirements released by Pang Dong Lai: 据胖东来发布的职位要求显示：

  • Applicants' educational background requires their first degree to be from a QS Top 50 university, majoring in Translation Studies, English, International Communication, or related fields; 应聘者教育背景要求第一学历毕业于 QS 排名前 50 院校，主修翻译学、英语、国际交流或相关专业；
  • Those with overseas study or work experience; those with a major in psychology/philosophy/law/history or with extensive business background are preferred; 有海外留学或工作经历者；有心理学/哲学/法律/历史专业或有丰富商业背景从业者优先；
  • Limited to women aged 40 and below; 限制 40 周岁及以下女性；
  • In terms of language proficiency, English proficiency is required to be at a fluent or native level, with preference given to those with an IELTS score of no less than 7.5 or a TOEFL score of no less than 100. 在语言能力上，要求英文水平达到精通或母语级别，雅思（IELTS）成绩不低于 7.5 分或托福（TOEFL）不低于 100 分者优先。

The purpose of recruiting for this position is to serve as an assistant translator for international experts, effectively promoting the exchange and communication of ideas. Through accurate translation, it aims to learn and share advanced world cultures, promoting the humanistic development of the enterprise and enhancing people's well-being. 而招聘该岗位的目的，是为国际专家做助理翻译，有效促进思想交流与沟通。通过精准翻译，学习和分享世界先进文化，促进企业人文发展和人们幸福度的提升。

What concerned the public most was that the salary and benefits for this position included paid leave of no less than 60 days. Additionally, the annual salary is no less than 500,000 yuan, negotiable based on actual abilities. 令大众最关注的是，该岗位薪资待遇显示，带薪休假不低于 60 天。此外年薪不低于 50 万，根据实际能力可面谈。

Jimu News reporters noted that, according to the 2026 QS World University Rankings, five universities from mainland China are among the top 50 globally: Peking University, Tsinghua University, Fudan University, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, and Zhejiang University. Additionally, HKU, CUHK, and HKUST are also in the top 50. Therefore, only 8 universities in China meet Pang Dong Lai's basic recruitment requirements. 极目新闻记者注意到，根据 2026 QS 世界大学排名，有五所中国内地高校跻身全球前 50，分别为北京大学、清华大学、复旦大学、上海交通大学、浙江大学。另有港大、港中大、港科大位列前五十。因此，中国仅有 8 所高校符合胖东来的基本招聘条件。

The receptionist for Pang Dong Lai's recruitment inquiry line stated that as of 24:00 on the 18th, the resume submission phase had ended. As for the specific application data, she could not see it yet. The interview stage will be arranged at the end of November, with the specific time to be announced later. 胖东来招聘咨询电话的接线人员表示，截至 18 日 24 时，简历投递环节已结束。至于具体报名数据，她暂时还看不到。面试环节会安排在 11 月底，具体时间后续再通知。

A representative from Pang Dong Lai stated, "This position has relatively strong requirements for professional skills, so this aspect was already considered during its setup." 胖东来方面人员表示，「这个岗位，对专业能力的要求是比较强一些，所以在设置的时候是已经考虑到这一方面。」

item.title: App Store 公布年度最佳应用入围名单
item.guid: App-Store-公布年度最佳应用入围名单
item.description:
Yesterday, Apple and Google successively announced the shortlist/rankings for the best software of 2025 on their respective platforms. 昨日，苹果、Google 纷纷公布了自家平台的 2025 最佳软件入围名单/排行榜。

App Store Awards Shortlist: App Store Awards 入围名单：

    China Region: A total of six shortlisted works, Tidal, CamScanner, and CapWords became the shortlisted works for App of the Year (Mainland China); "Adventurer's Diary," "Infinity Nikki," and "Valorant Mobile: Origin Action" became the shortlisted works for Game of the Year (Mainland China) category.

    Global: A total of 45 applications were shortlisted. Notably, "Adventurer's Diary" and "Infinity Nikki" were shortlisted for iPhone Game of the Year and iPad Game of the Year, respectively.

Google Play Best of 2025: Google Play Best of 2025：

According to reports, this year's Google Play Best of 2025 list features 15 apps and games from 14 developer teams in the Greater China region, winning 16 "Best of the Year" awards across various global markets. 据介绍，今年的 Google Play Best of 2025 榜单上，共有 14 个来自大中华地区的开发者团队的 15 款应用和游戏，在全球不同市场斩获 16 个年度最佳奖项。

Among them, "Wuthering Waves" won the Best Ongoing Game in the US region, and Kling AI (Kling AI) won the Most Entertaining App of the Year in the Hong Kong, China region. 其中《鸣潮》获美区年度最佳持续影响力游戏，可灵 AI（Kling AI）获中国香港区年度最具娱乐性应用。

item.title: 网红健身房「超级猩猩」多地闭店，客服回应「合同到期没续」
item.guid: 网红健身房「超级猩猩」多地闭店，客服回应「合同到期没续」
item.description:
According to Sina Finance, SUPERMONKEY has recently seen store closures in multiple cities across China, including Beijing, Shanghai, Wuhan, Chengdu, and Shenzhen. Specific affected stores include SUPERMONKEY Financial City in99 store and SUPERMONKEY Wangjing CapitaMall All-Round store. 据新浪财经报道，超级猩猩（SUPERMONKEY）近期位于北京、上海、武汉、成都、深圳等全国多地的门店出现了闭店情况，已知涉及的具体门店包括超级猩猩金融城 in99 店、超级猩猩望京凯德 MALL 全能店等。

Furthermore, on June 14, 2024, SUPERMONKEY announced its simultaneous entry into Fuzhou and Xiamen. However, statistics show that Fuzhou and Xiamen quietly withdrew from the cities one year after "opening," and all 8 stores have now announced their closure. 此外，2024 年 6 月 14 日，超级猩猩宣布同时进驻福州、厦门两城。但据统计发现，福州、厦门「开城」一年后就已悄然撤城， 目前 8 家门店均已宣布歇业。

Regarding this round of store closures in multiple cities across the country, SUPERMONKEY customer service stated, "Some store closures are due to contracts expiring and not being renewed. We will also consider reopening stores near the original locations, but the specific decision will depend on the company's operations department." 对于此轮全国多地闭店情况，超级猩猩客服表示，「部分门店闭店原因是由于合同到期，没有续约等。我们也会考虑在原先门店附近重新开门店，但具体要看公司运营部门的选择情况。」

The customer service representative further stated, "If private lessons cannot continue due to store closures, or if there is a balance on the Super Monkey card, a full refund is available. You can contact customer service directly to resolve this." 该客服人员进一步表示，「如果因为闭店的原因导致私教课没有办法继续上，以及超猩卡还有余额，这种情况是可以全额退款的，可以直接联系客服进行解决。」

It's worth noting that Liu Shuting, founder and CEO of SUPERMONKEY, once had a vision to open 10,000 stores within 10 years. Now, 5 years have passed, and its scale has only reached nearly 300 stores, with a completion rate of less than 3%. 值得一提的是，超级猩猩创始人兼 CEO 刘舒婷曾有个愿景， 10 年内开一万家门店。如今 5 年已过，其规模仅仅达到了近 300 家，完成率不足 3%。

item.title: 高司令主演，惊悚片《挽救计划》发布新预告
item.guid: 高司令主演，惊悚片《挽救计划》发布新预告
item.description:
According to Sina Movies, a new trailer has been released for the sci-fi thriller "Project Hail Mary," starring Ryan Gosling and Sandra Hüller. The film is set to be released in North America on March 20, 2026. 据新浪电影消息，瑞恩·高斯林、桑德拉·惠勒主演的科幻惊悚片《挽救计划》发布新预告，影片将于 2026 年 3 月 20 日北美上映。

The film is adapted from Andy Weir's novel of the same name, the author of "The Martian" (Chinese translated title "Project Hail Mary"). It is directed by Phil Lord and Chris Miller ("The Lego Movie," "21 Jump Street") and written by Drew Goddard ("The Martian"). 该片改编自《火星救援》原作安迪·威尔的同名小说（中文版译名《挽救计划》），菲尔·洛德和克里斯·米勒（《乐高大电影》《龙虎少年队》）执导，德鲁·高达（《火星救援》）编剧。

The film tells the story of Ryan waking up in a spaceship light-years away from Earth. As fragments of his memory piece together, a suffocating truth emerges: the sun is dying, Earth is in peril, and he, an ordinary teacher who usually stands at a podium, has been chosen to complete an "impossible mission" alone. 影片讲述了瑞恩在距离地球数光年的飞船中醒来，随着记忆碎片拼合，一个令人窒息的真相浮出水面：太阳正在死去，地球危在旦夕，而他作为一个平日里站在讲台的普通老师，竟被选中独自完成一场「不可能的任务」的故事。

item.title: 电影《Is This Thing On?》发布正式预告
item.guid: 电影《Is-This-Thing-On?》发布正式预告
item.description:
Recently, the official trailer for the comedy film "Is This Thing On?", directed by and starring Bradley Cooper (Chinese translated title "Is This Thing On?"), has been released. It will premiere in North America on December 19. 日前，布莱德利·库珀导演并主演的喜剧电影《Is This Thing On?》（中文译名《开麦了吗？》）发布正式预告，将于 12 月 19 日北美上映。

The film's story is inspired by the life of British comedian John Bishop, following a couple, Alex and Tess, who decide to amicably separate after years of marriage and embark on a new phase of independent living. During this time, they explore how to co-parent their two children and maintain a friendship. Alex discovers a new hobby, becoming a stand-up comedian in New York's West Village, and gains a clearer understanding of himself and his relationships. 该片故事灵感来自英国喜剧演员约翰·毕晓普的一生，讲述一对夫妻 Alex 和 Tess 在经历多年生活后决定和平分手，开启独立生活的新阶段，两人在此期间探索如何共同抚养两个孩子，并保持朋友关系，Alex 发掘了新的爱好，成为纽约西村的单口喜剧演员，也对自己和感情方面有了更清楚的认识。

The film is directed by Bradley Cooper, starring Will Arnett and Laura Dern. 该片由布莱德利·库珀执导，威尔·阿奈特和劳拉·邓恩主演。

item.title: 《水之年代》发布预告
item.guid: 《水之年代》发布预告
item.description:
It is reported that Kristen Stewart's directorial debut feature film "The Chronology of Water" has released its trailer. The film is scheduled for a limited release in North America on December 5 this year, and will expand on January 9, 2026. 据悉，克里斯汀·斯图尔特导演首部长片《水之年代》发布预告，影片定档今年 12 月 5 日北美小范围上映，将于 2026 年 1 月 9 日扩映。

The film focuses on a swimmer's journey of redemption as she transforms into an artist, exploring themes through the lens of gender, sexuality, violence, and family. She survives a destructive life of abuse, drug addiction, self-destruction, and the loss of her child, ultimately becoming a successful teacher, mother, and writer. 影片聚焦一个游泳运动员转变为艺术家的救赎之旅，通过性别、性、暴力和家庭的角度展开，她从遭受虐待、吸毒上瘾、自我毁灭和失去孩子的毁灭性生活中存活，最终成为一名成功的教师、母亲和作家。

The film's story is adapted from Lydia Yuknavitch's memoir. Stewart and Yuknavitch's husband, Andy Mingo, wrote the screenplay, and Imogen Poots stars. 该片故事改编自莉迪亚·尤克纳维奇所著回忆录，斯图尔特和尤克纳维奇丈夫安迪·明戈写剧本，伊莫珍·波茨主演。
